b63fda52-6df4-487b-85c0-38233dd6f5be.description: Abilitie’s Rising Leader Program provides tomorrow’s leaders the business, management, and leadership skills necessary to thrive in our fast-paced global business environment. Our team-based business simulations serve as the backbone of a unique and enriching 10- to 14-week virtual mini-MBA program. Case study discussions, action-learning projects, and interactive online pre-work assignments also play a key role in the immersive learning environment.

8694bf1f-ff18-4d94-b54d-f1f3e57ecb2a.description: In Abilitie’s Becoming An Effective Manager Program, participants practice coaching and communication skills in an intensive blended curriculum that builds their people management skills. Participants uncover what it takes to lead teams to success. They gain an understanding of their personal management style and practice how to engage their direct reports while honing coaching and cross-functional communication skills.

d65d74a9-65da-44fa-b3b6-548e27e100d3.description: In Abilitie’s Developing Business Acumen Program, participants practice using the essential tools of financial analysis and business valuation in a cohort-based blended curriculum that builds their analytical skills. Participants gain deep insight into the drivers of value and connect those drivers to day-to-day decisions. They build an understanding of key financial terms and reports while practicing how to draw connections between tactical decisions and big-picture impact.

They build an understanding of capital investments, learn how to plan for maximum returns, and practice communicating complex financial concepts.

d3c316e1-cda0-4754-8564-8ff215f5586b.description: In Abilitie’s Leading Organizational Change Program, participants practice connecting organizational values to high-level strategic choices and leading at the executive level. 2749c606-d41f-4d13-8307-9c91bdced9b6.description: Abilitie’s Senior Leader Program develops critical business and leadership skills in VP-level and C-suite leaders. They uncover personal leadership blind spots and hone their business and financial acumen. Key concepts include influencing, long-term investment skills, decision-making skills, and developing coherent strategies for execution across organizational silos.
